${app.site.globalPageTitle}

<#if (pageProperties["overview"]??)>
${pageProperties["overview"].displayableValue}
<#list pageProperties?keys?sort as property> <#if !(property?starts_with("jcr:") || property?starts_with("_"))>
<#if property!="overview"> <@panel_main_body_render_property pageProperties[property].name pageProperties[property].displayableValue/>
<#macro panel_main_body_render_property propertyName propertyValue>

${propertyName}

<#if propertyValue?matches("^[0\\+][\\(\\) \\-\\d]*$")> ${propertyValue} <#elseif propertyValue?matches("^https?://.*")> ${propertyValue} <#elseif propertyValue?matches("^[\\w\\.=-]+@[\\w\\.-]+\\.[\\w]{2,3}$")> ${propertyValue} <#else> ${propertyValue}
